articles.title: Red Bull announce F2 and F3 seats for junior drivers, with Daruvala set to stay with Carlin for 2021 - Formula 1 RSS UK
articles.description: The Red Bull Junior Team have announced the locations of their Formula 2 and Formula 3 drivers for the 2021 campaign, including an increase in faith in Hitech Grand Prix, with no fewer than four drivers earning a seat with the Silverstone based outfit.
